mapper.select: SELECT A.name, A.reviewid, B.productname, A.productid, B.parentpid AS parentid, A.content, A.createdate FROM (SELECT m.name, r.reviewid, r.productid, r.content, r.createdate FROM review r, member m WHERE r.memberid = m.memberid) A, product B WHERE B.productid = A.productid AND B.parentpid = #{parentPID}

SELECT COUNT(*) AS cnt FROM (SELECT r.productid, m.memberid FROM review r, member m WHERE r.memberid = m.memberid) A, product B WHERE B.productid = A.productid AND B.parentpid = #{parentPID} AND A.memberid = #{memberID}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review(productid, memberid, content) VALUES (#{productID}, #{memberID}, #{content})
